name: shared-print-hub
description: ## North American Shared Print Retention Hub website

scripts.postCssWatch: echo '=> postcss is now watching for changes to resources/styles/source/mapStyle_next.css' && $(npm bin)/postcss resources/styles/source/mapStyle_next.css --use postcss-cssnext --output resources/styles/mapStyle.css --watch
scripts.postProcessorCss: echo '=> postcss is now updating all css changes from /mapStyle_next.css to /mapStyle.css' && $(npm bin)/postcss resources/styles/source/mapStyle_next.css --use postcss-cssnext --output resources/styles/mapStyle.css
scripts.build: echo '=> building minified JavaScript and post-processing CSS' && npm run minifyJS -s && npm run postProcessorCss -s
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run minifyJS && npm run postCssWatch' resources/scripts/ resources/styles/

author: Alister A. Fenix
